items.sentence: Well, aren\'t you going to answer your phone?
We carried a map with us in case we got lost.
When was the last time you hung out with Tom?
When was the last time you painted a picture?
If Tom had had time, he would\'ve visited us.
You shouldn\'t judge a man by his appearance.
It\'s a rainy day, so we can\'t play outside.
It\'s amazing that we all didn\'t get killed.
You need to be more positive about your work.
Tom plans to hire someone that speaks French.
Tom plays the guitar, sings and writes songs.
Tom poured Mary a drink and handed it to her.
I hope you won\'t expect results immediately.
I chose not to do that the way Tom suggested.
I could probably convince Tom not to do that.
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t likely to do that.
Why are those people climbing up on the roof?
Why are you doing your homework at this time?
Why are you drinking at this time of the day?
Why are you thinking about quitting your job?
